game_description: Sledge Destruction Simulator is a physics based VR game that allows you to destroy a large variety of objects with a sledge hammer and other props. The sledge hammer and props respond to weight and swing speed. The objects that you destroy are collapsible and can be destroyed in millions of different ways. 40+ Objects and structures to destroy. The most destruction physics that the Quest 2 can handle. Stay tuned for updates and improvements! Optimized for Quest 2

review_4: This game should not cost anything for the amount of gameplay there is. I was expecting much more but there is like 20 ish objects you can break and they all are just broken within like 5 hits. It wasn’t enough game to cost anything. I don’t recommend buying it. review_5: Just downloaded this game and had a lot of fun playing it. The physics are good and there are plenty of objects to break! Might have missed it but it would be cool to be able to place more objects in one round. The space background is really cool and the game is very visually pleasing!
